text:
Quatico.tech | Java Backend or Full-stack or Frontend | Zurich | SALARY: 90k-120k CHF | ONSITE | EU-Passport holders only or eligible to work in Switzerland

Quatico has a true "engineering over management" culture. Our CTO did his Ph.D. with Erich Gamma at IBM (Gang of Four) and really is a world class engineering-lead.

We build web products in three main areas:

1) A platform that integrates (leverages Magnolia, AEM) to build a headless CMS, behind which one can put anything, even stuff like Hybris, SAP. This is with what we started doing engineering 15 years ago.

2) Tailored web apps with heavy number crunching on the server - e.g., we built the software analyzing all the weather data in Switzerland for the Swiss Metereology.

These kind of things bring in 60% of the revenue, this sector is increasing.

3) We are finishing building a SaaS product for Yoga studios in Zurich that can be adjusted to any business with a Business Process Management Suite, meaning that you can use and adjust it for the needs of hairdressers without having to write any code. 0% of revenue yet but this should change in Q1/Q2 2018.

We are always using the newest version of Java and the best tools available. Also, we aren't against other stacks like Python or Clojure and don't mind introducing new tools at all.

German is not needed as long as your English is good and you at least show willingness to learn German.

The interview process:

1) Phone screen

2) Coding task (skipped depending on first impression)

3) Onsite half day with us (we pay expenses)

Send us a short intro about yourself to:

jobs@quatico.tech
